title: Sugguestion, Key frags for Gemstones
body: I think being able to convert excess key frags into something useful would be a nice touch. I'm thinking 20-25 frags = 1 gemstone.

replies.body: How is it even possible to have that many extra key fragments..?

I doubt a statistically significant portion of the playerbase does. I certainly don't. How ever key frags are worthless for anything besides becoming keys. No reason keys don't auto build currently, so I'm trying to find a way that makes folks feel better about being honorable, having value for stocking key frags, and unlock some cool content in non RNG ways.
Are just not getting chests? Or are you just playing so much that you've one too many keys?
